conversation_history.content: What symptoms are you currently experiencing?
How long have you been experiencing these symptoms?
Have you noticed any specific triggers or activities that make your symptoms worse?
It hurts more when I look up.
Are you experiencing any other symptoms alongside the main ones you mentioned, such as fever, fatigue, or changes in appetite?
Have you had any recent illnesses, injuries, or changes in your environment or routine that you think might be related to your symptoms?

possible_next_steps: Monitor the headache and observe any new symptoms that may develop.
Evaluate daily activities or screen time that might contribute to eye strain.
If the headache persists or shows no improvement, consider visiting a healthcare professional.
summary: The patient has been experiencing a headache for about 3-5 days.
No recent illnesses, injuries, or major changes in routine noted.
